author: adminescalation
description: Manage and display disclaimers for users based on their professions when a disclaimer may be appropriate - eg, lawyer, doctor, judge, law enforcement. This cog allows you to add, remove, and display predefined disclaimers for users in your Discord server.
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed Disclaimers.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Need help?** [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs).
name: disclaimers
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores flags on a user about their profession.
short: Manage and display user disclaimers based on professions
